author: costin
msg: Fix for bug in RequestInterceptor calling - some methods were not
called/implemented.
Thanks  Harish <harishv@postmark.net> for finding this one.
Note that pre/postService is called twice for servlets invoked via
InvokerServlet - if you depend on that it's possible to do a quick fix,
otherwise it'll be post 3.1.

author: costin
msg: Fixed session support via URL rewriting with Apache.
Tested for Apache+tomcat, no test for load balancing.
Fixed few minor bugs in Ajp12 adapter.

author: costin
msg: Partial fix for bug #1.
Note that URL rewriting is not a stable feature - integration with
Apache, NES and IIS needs to be tested and many issues need to be
documented ( like how it works if you have HTML pages, etc).
I checked in a fix for mod_jserv, but it doesn't work yet for rewriting.
The patch was submitted by  "G�bor Lipt�k" <gaborliptak@usa.net>.
Submitted by:	 "G�bor" "Lipt�k" <gaborliptak@usa.net>

author: costin
msg: Removed obsolete Tomcat-apache howto.
Added few more comments to the uguide - this is the reference document
for installing tomcat and for tomcat-web server integration.

author: jhunter
msg: Made the build work under IRIX by adding $JAVA_HOME/lib/dev.jar to the "cp"
classpath.  That's where IRIX puts the javac classes.  Go figure.
